Pre-Game Insights: The Pacers have gone 11-14 against Eastern Conference teams.
The Bulls are 3-5 in division play.
The Pacers' 12.8 made 3-pointers per game this season are only 0.7 fewer made shots on average than the 13.5 per game the Bulls give up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pacers are ninth in the league with 28.0 assists per game led by Tyrese Haliburton averaging 8.8.
The Bulls are shooting 46.7% from the field, 0.9% lower than the 47.6% the Pacers' opponents have shot this season.
Coby White is shooting 43.2% and averaging 18.5 points for the Bulls.
Others: The Pacers will try to keep their three-game win streak alive when they take on the Bulls.
Indiana is sixth in the Eastern Conference.
The Bulls have a 9-12 record in games decided by at least 10 points.
